article: Liu Bing is Zhang Kun's friend, and now he is in a high school in Ottawa. This is a letter  _  Liu Bing to Zhang Kun. Dear Zhang Kun, Thank you  _  your postcard. I'm  _  to you in the reading-room. Now I have many new friends here. Henry is one of them. He is my classmate. He is 14  _  old. His mother is a Canadian, but his father is from Australia. He often  _  me to go to his home for dinner  _  his parents. His family like China very much. At school, we have many good teachers. One of them is from the USA. We  _  her Miss Green. She teaches English. Our French teacher is Mr. Smith, and he is from Paris. He loves  _  very much, and we all love him. Our Chinese teacher is Mr. Scott, and he likes Chinese kung fu very much. After school, he often talks to me in Chinese.  _  is your English now? I want to know something  _  you very much, please write to me soon. Yours, Liu Bing
